desc: Laybio Natural is the herbal extracts supplier specializing in manufacturing high quality organic and conventional herbal extracts. Featured products include Ganoderma Lucidum (Reishi Mushroom) Extract, Hemp Protein, Hericium Extract, Pea Protein, Beet Root, sea buckthorn and goji.

layout.text: Laybio Natural operates the largest farm network in Shaanxi China, allowing us to provide consistent quality at competitive price.
